title: STOP over billing
text: DO NOT buy any power-ups in this game. If you do check your bill very carefully. Two times now I‚Äôve been over billed for a purchase. Both times the purchase for $2.99 bills at $8.49 and it is mind numbing trying to get it refunded. KING you‚Äôre leaving yourselves open to a fraud charge.

title: Fun but cheats you out of rewards
text: This game is fun, but when you get a life reward you really don‚Äôt get the extra lives. Say you have 4 lives left and pass a level where you get 5 lives as a reward. You would think you‚Äôd have 9 life‚Äôs right? WRONG! All you get is 1 life so you go back to 5, which is full life. That‚Äôs pretty much cheating the player out of the full reward.

title: Fun game but the bombs are a detriment
text: Candy crush is a lot of fun.  Best I‚Äôve seen of this type of game.  But it has one major drawback: timebombs.  What good does it do to have 20 moves when the game drops 20 timebombs with a 14 move countdown?   Or worse, if it drops a single bomb with a 2-move countdown and absolutely no way for the player to counteract it?  This does not promote game enjoyment.   If not for that, the game would be just about perfect.  But the timebombs are both too many and too short-lived... if even necessary to game play.  I consider them a detriment to game function.  At about leve 272 or so the game became so impossible to win I deleted it.  Fun up to that point, so no real complaints. But when a game becomes so difficult it can‚Äôt be won... it‚Äôs no longer a game.

title: Fun but too frustrating!
text: This game is addictive and fun and I like the exploding candy sugar rush action.  Some of the levels are hard and I agree with other reviewers who say you win only when the game ‚Äúlets‚Äù you win.  I got up to level 190 and have played it hundreds of times and cannot win.  I even looked at winning strategies and videos, all to no avail.  Gold bars are too expensive as well as the boosters.  So, sadly, I deleted the app.  Why have levels that are so hard to beat - I like a challenge, but come on.

title: Last update

Now mine is stuck at 63.
